cards.example: The skyscraper was a gargantuan structure that dominated the city skyline.
cards.definition: tremendous in size, volume, or degree.

cards.example: She delivered an eloquent speech that moved everyone in the audience.
cards.definition: having or showing fluent, articulate, and persuasive speech or writing.

cards.example: Despite facing numerous setbacks, he remained resilient and never gave up.
cards.definition: able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions, able to bounce back or adapt to challenges.

cards.example: She was a zealous advocate for animal rights, dedicating her life to their welfare.
cards.definition: filled with or showing great enthusiasm, passion, or fervor for a cause, belief, or activity.

cards.example: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in today's society, with almost everyone owning one.
cards.definition: present, found, or existing everywhere or in many places at the same time, being constantly or widely encountered.
